mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.username,u.`password`,u.avatar,u.nick_name,u.status,r.role_name,r.role_comments,p.permission_name,p.permission_comments,p.address FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r on ur.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp on r.id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p on rp.permission_id=p.id ${ew.customSqlSegment} and ur.deleted=0 and u.deleted=0 and rp.deleted=0 order by u.id

SELECT u.id,u.username,u.avatar,u.nick_name,u.phone_number,u.email,r.id,r.role_name,r.role_comments FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r on ur.role_id=r.id WHERE u.deleted=0 and ur.deleted=0 and u.id=#{id} order by u.id
